Numbers and Strings
================

```{r}
giveoutliers <- function(v){
  a <- quantile(v)
  b <- a[[2]]
  c <- a[[4]]
  x<-v[which(v>c)]
  y<-v[which(v<b)]
  return(c(y,x))
  }

giveoutliers(c(1,2,3,4,22))
```

```{r}
outlier <- function(v){
  a <-quantile(v)
  b <- a[[2]]
  c <- a[[4]]
  if(v < b else v>c)return(TRUE)
  }

outlier(c(1,2,3,22))
```
